data.actual_result: The CP does not hide, causing it to crash when interacting with it during the reload.
data.expected_result: Discord should hide the CP when reloading, as it does when you leave a call/voice channel.
data.short_description: [most likely macOS specific] Discord crashes when joining a call, reloading the client and then interacting with the properties of the “Top Secret Control Panel” in the menu bar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure the control panel icon is visible in the menu bar at the top of your screen. - Join a voice channel or call. - Without leaving the call press CMD/Ctrl + R - Discord should/will now reload and the application will reappear within a couple seconds. - When the discord logo starts to spin, click on the “Top Secret Control Panel” dropdown icon. - Quickly press “Mute” & “Deafen” a couple times before Discord finishes reloading. - Discord should now abort the reload and crash. - This may require a couple of attempts as the interaction with the Control Panel (CP) fails sometimes.
